name: doomsday
content:

the end of the world, or a time when something very bad will happen: Ecologists predict a doomsday scenario (= a time when death and destruction will happen) if global warming continues to increase at the present rate. You could talk till/until doomsday (= for a very long time), but they will never change their minds. Synonym
Judgment Day
